name: Stylish Editor Dark Theme  1.1d
description:
Makes the stylish editor have a dark theme. [Read Instructions or this style dosen't work!]
Alert - This is discontinued, feel free to reupload & change
additional_info:
Instructions:
Just set the http://your.site.com to the prefix of your editor link (for chrome users, it's chrome-extension://fjnbnpbmkenffdnngjfgmeleoegfcffe , for firefox users it may vary) 
----
v1.1d - No longer works with modern versions of Stylish for Firefox, you can manually update it now, I'll no longer be updating this, Discontinued.
v1.1c - nothing much just updating a few things
v1.1b - Fixed the incompatibility of chrome, now requires you to set your url-prefix manually.
v1.1 - Fixed the bright borders on some elements and fixed the Add button joining with the textbox. 
v1.0b - Made the shadow at the toolbox white to add a feeling to the theme
v1.0 - Release
